headline: Cardinal Health’s Broad Profit Growth Raises Questions On Valuation Gap
summary: Cardinal Health (NYSE:CAH) reported strong fourth quarter results, with double-digit profit growth across all five operating segments. The pharmaceutical and specialty solutions segment was the main driver of profit growth in the period. Management pointed to ongoing success in executing its business priorities and focus areas across the company. Cardinal Health is a major healthcare services and products company that plays a central role in drug distribution and specialty solutions for...
